coverOutsourcing.h1: We bring clients to innovative services
coverOutsourcing.p1: Leave your sales matters to a network of experienced salespeople — focus on your growth!

coverExpansion.p1: We best know the Czech market and our local distribution network is here for your needs.

why.p1: More than 90% of startups fail in the first 2 years of their existence, and our estimates say that up to 70% of those who failed could be helped to succeed by quick feedback from real customers. We understand that the founders are overwhelmed by their product development and for the rest “there is no time“.

contactUs.p1: We will consult your individual needs and send you more detailed information on possible cooperation, including specific commission conditions.

services.p1: We solve needs of technological B2B innovative companies (especially startups without a sales team) engaged in software or hardware development.

salesTeam.li1: You don't waste time looking for, training and leading sales representatives or teams.
salesTeam.li2: You only pay commissions for closed deals.
salesTeam.li3: Expertise - we assign salespeople according to the field.
salesTeam.li4: A functioning sales team with an optimized price vs. performance ratio.

localRepre.li3: A team located throughout the Czech Rep. - you do not waste time on long journeys

existRel.p1: We have a number of already established relationships with customers - you don't start “from scratch“.

services.expansionCz: We offer expansion to the Czech rep.

userSupport.li2: Providing feedback and suggestions for improvement
userSupport.li3: Email and phone support 9AM - 5PM on working days

1.p1: Don't create a product if you don't know who you're creating it for. With us, you will understand which customers are most important to you and, above all, you will find out how much space is on the market. As part of the start-up package, we will prepare introductory market research for you.

2.p1: Feedback is the key to any product and for startups, and software and hardware in general! You get feedback from your new, existing and potential customers in real-time.

3.p1: Nothing is more difficult than addressing new contacts, finding the right decision-makers in the customer's company and presenting the product to usually very busy people. We solve all this for you.

4.p1: Don't waste your time handling elementary queries from customers (e.g. where they find a particular button). You will only deal with technical problems and the rest will reach you in the form of feedback.

5.p1: The relationship with the customer never ends when the deal is closed. The customer expects the product to be further developed and the cooperation to be deepen as much as possible. Our sales representatives listen to the customer's needs and maintain a long-term relationship with them.

6.p1: The first sales will start the initial cash flow of your newly emerging project. You will be able to innovate faster and invest where needed.

1.h: Who does your sales team consist of?
1.p1: Our sales team combines the experience of senior salespeople who oversee junior sales representatives. In this way, we can optimize the price vs. performance ratio for the needs of the startup.

2.h: What if you bring us too many customers and we don't manage to serve them?
2.p1: We divide customers into several groups. First, we will bring you a small number of customers (usually up to 5), where you can try your service. At the same time, we already have other waiting customers in reserve with an interest in your product (usually 10 - 20), to whom you can offer your services as soon as they are verified on a small sample. We will dose other customers to you as you will be able to scale your business.

3.h: What if there won't be any interest in my product?
3.p1: We promote a “fail fast” approach. If you fail early, you will your save time and money wasted on developing something that has no chance of succeeding in the market.
3.p2: If you do not succeed in cooperating with us, you will most likely not succeed alone. We will be happy to provide you with information on other market opportunities.

4.h: Can we deal with customers directly?
4.p1: Of course. We will only give you recommendations and agree on a code of ethics on how to deal with customers. Key customers will certainly appreciate the direct contact with the founders.

5.h: Isn't it better to use marketing? What about a Google / Facebook campaign?
5.p1: Marketing is definitely a way to promote products for which we already know the market. In general, this type of marketing is more suitable for B2C services that have low commissions per customer. We can offer ways to combine marketing and business appropriately and connect you with a marketing agency that will take care of you, or provide you with general recommendations.

6.h: Are you something like an accelerator program?
6.p1: We have chosen only a part of what acceleration programs do and we try to offer what most accelerators won't offer under such advantageous conditions. We therefore work in synergy with some accelerators. Unlike acceleration programs, cooperation with us isn't time-limited.

forDealers.p1: Are you an experienced dealer or do you just enjoy closing deals and do you feel to be talented in this area? By joining our network, experienced salespeople will gain access to a wide network of regional salespeople, which will allow them to better serve their existing customers, and for the less experienced we have prepared a system of training and professional growth.
forDealers.li2: Cooperation in a network of local dealers
forDealers.li4: No meaningless products without added value for the customer

specialization.p1: Fields in which we have more clients, so we have specialized salespeople available.

gastro.p2: We can offer you a consultation to streamline and innovate your work processes. Areas we consult most often:

ecommerce.p1: E-shops and other websites that allow online payments.

specialization.note: Do you do business in another field? Don't worry, we are flexible. We will quickly find your way in your field as well.

priceList.startPackDesc: Market research, training of sales representatives
priceList.cooperationDesc: The fee partially covers our operating costs at a time when turnover is minimal.
priceList.consultations: Expert consultations beyond the usual services

field-reasons.1: Everything "under one roof" - we provide communication between the client and individual service providers.
field-reasons.2: Innovations and integrations - for our recommended solutions, we strive for the highest possible compatibility and integration. We constantly collect feedback from clients and pass it on to service creators so that the solution meets the needs of clients even better.
field-reasons.3: Trust - long-term relationships are our recipe for maintaining good relationships between clients and service providers.

codeOfEthics.li2: We do not close deals until we are convinced of the added value for the other party and adherence to the win-win principle.
codeOfEthics.li3: If we see risks, we will always alert them to the other side.
codeOfEthics.li4: We care about building a long-term relationship with customers and partners.
codeOfEthics.li5: We adhere to the deadlines we set, otherwise we will notify you in a timely manner of their unattainability.
codeOfEthics.note: Adherence to this Code of Ethics is not legally enforceable, however, we carefully monitor compliance with the Code. We will be happy if you notify us of any violations.

fieldEcommerce.p1: We offer to clients in the field of e-commerce (e-shops and websites with online payments) consultations in which we can design effective solutions for further growth.
fieldEcommerce.otherFields: Other fields in which we specialize:

blog.consultTopic: Do you want to discuss this topic with us?
